    • Constructor Detail

      • Joystick

        public Joystick(java.lang.String path_to_js)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor for Joystick. Events will be read from the File specified by the path in path_to_js
        Parameters:
        path_to_js - The path to the jsX file. Most likely /dev/input/js0
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file cannot be opened

      • setColor

        public void setColor(int red,
                     int green,
                     int blue)
        Sets the Color for the Joystick LEDs. ONLY AVAILABLE FOR DS4 CONTROLLERS
        Parameters:
        red - typically 0-255. specifies the red brightness
        green - typically 0-255. specifies the green brightness
        blue - typically 0-255. specifies the blue brightness

      • setPattern

        public void setPattern(int pattern)
        Sets the pattern to be executed by the Joystick LEDs. NOT YET IMPLEMENTED. ONLY AVAILABLE FOR XBOX360 CONTROLLERS
        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern to be executed
